title: #62 Larry Elder, Karen Straughan and Mrs. Crowder!
description: Crowder announces his upcoming knee surgery and actually thanks NotGayJared for helping him. Mrs. Crowder complains about Steven arguing with doctors. Also, great guests, Larry Elder and Karen Straughan!
